channel.title: Advanced usage on Peertube plugin livechat documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced usage on Peertube plugin livechat documentation

item.title: XMPP clients
item.description: This page is not written yet. It should explain how you can connect with XMPP clients. For now you can’t connect to your Peertube chat account using a XMPP client. This feature could be added one day, depending on the interest about it.

item.title: Using Matterbridge
item.description: Here is a tutorial to use Matterbridge with the plugin: https://gitlab.com/refrac/obs-matterbridge-overlay/-/blob/master/documentation/peertube.md
